item.name: Active Sessions
item.params: select count(*), status from gv$session where status = 'ACTIVE' group by status;

item.name: Administrative
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='Administrative' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: Application
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='Application' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: Average Active Session
item.params: select round(count(*)/120,1) FROM gv$active_session_history where sample_time >= sysdate - 2/1440

item.name: Block_Corruption
item.params: select count(*) from v$DATABASE_BLOCK_CORRUPTION

item.name: Cluster
item.params: select nvl(sum(round(m.time_waited / nvl(m.INTSIZE_CSEC, 0), 3)), 0) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class = 'Cluster' and m.wait_class_id = n.wait_class_id

item.name: Commit
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='Commit' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: Concurrency
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='Concurrency' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: Configuration
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='Configuration' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: DB CPU
item.params: select round(value/100,3) from v$sysmetric where metric_name='CPU Usage Per Sec' and group_id=2

item.name: Datafile Status
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM v$datafile WHERE (status != 'ONLINE' AND status != 'SYSTEM')

item.name: Database Available
item.params: SELECT CASE status WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM V$INSTANCE
item.description: Indisponibilidade banco de dados Oracle (#Condições: 0 'Zero' banco de dados no ar , valor 1 indisponivel o banco de dados)

item.name: Database name
item.params: select name from v$database
item.description: Coletando o nome do banco de dados

item.name: DB Occupied Size
item.params: select sum(bytes) from dba_segments

item.name: DB Size
item.params: select ( select sum(bytes) data_size from dba_data_files ) + ( select nvl(sum(bytes),0) temp_size from dba_temp_files ) + ( select sum(bytes) redo_size from sys.v_$log ) + ( select sum(BLOCK_SIZE*FILE_SIZE_BLKS) controlfile_size from v$controlfile) from dual

item.name: Gap Archive
item.params: select a.SEQ_Primary-b.SEQ_Standby GAP from (select dest_id, max(SEQUENCE#) SEQ_Primary from v$archived_log where dest_id=1 group by dest_id) a,(select dest_id, max(SEQUENCE#) SEQ_Standby from v$archived_log where APPLIED ='YES' and dest_id=2 group by dest_id) b

item.name: Gap Archive
item.params: SELECT round(24*(first_time-(select first_time from v$log_history where sequence# = (select max(seq) from inm_monitor.stdby_logseq))),2) total_min FROM v$log_history WHERE sequence# = (SELECT max(sequence#) FROM v$log_history)

item.name: Instance name
item.params: select instance_name from v$instance;

item.name: Locks
item.params: select count(*) from gv$session where username is not null and blocking_session is not null and event <> 'read by other session' and last_call_et > 300 and event not like 'PX%' and username not in ('SYS', 'SYSTEM', 'SYSMAN', 'DBSNMP') and username not like 'DBA_%';
item.description: Condições: Se retorna algum valor diferente de 0, está com lock

item.name: Critical Locks
item.params: select count(1) qtd FROM gv$session WHERE (blocking_session IS NOT NULL AND LAST_CALL_ET >= 300 AND EVENT NOT LIKE 'PX Deq%' AND USERNAME IS NOT NULL AND (username LIKE 'WCORRETOR' OR username LIKE 'OPERACAO' OR username LIKE 'USUARIO%' OR username LIKE 'P_RESSEG%'))

item.name: Log file sync
item.params: select round(10*m.time_waited/nullif(m.wait_count,0),3) from v$eventmetric m, v$event_name n where m.event_id=n.event_id and n.name = 'log file sync'

item.name: Log file parallel write
item.params: select round(10*m.time_waited/nullif(m.wait_count,0),3) from v$eventmetric m, v$event_name n where m.event_id=n.event_id and n.name = 'log file parallel write'
item.description: Evento Oracle: log file parallel write (ms)

item.name: Query long time
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM gv$session WHERE type NOT IN ('BACKGROUND','FOREGROUND') AND last_call_et/60 > 720 AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND event NOT LIKE '%Backup%' AND username NOT IN ('SYS','SYSTEM');

item.name: Network
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='Network' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: Other
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='Other' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: Path Read
item.params: select nvl(sum(round(10 * m.time_waited / nullif(m.wait_count, 0), 3)), 0) from v$eventmetric m, v$event_name n where m.event_id = n.event_id and n.name = 'direct path read'

item.name: Path Read Temp
item.params: select nvl(sum(round(10 * m.time_waited / nullif(m.wait_count, 0), 3)), 0) from v$eventmetric m, v$event_name n where m.event_id = n.event_id and n.name = 'direct path read temp'

item.name: Path Write
item.params: select nvl(sum(round(10 * m.time_waited / nullif(m.wait_count, 0), 3)),0) from v$eventmetric m, v$event_name n where m.event_id = n.event_id and n.name = 'direct path write'

item.name: Path Write Temp
item.params: SELECT nvl(sum(round(10 * m.time_waited / nullif(m.wait_count, 0), 3)), 0) time FROM v$eventmetric m, v$event_name n WHERE m.event_id = n.event_id AND n.name = 'direct path write temp'

item.name: Number of processes
item.params: select count(*) "procnum" from v$process

item.name: Redo History
item.params: select count(*) from v$log_history where first_time >= sysdate - 15/1440

item.name: Resumable Space - Aborted
item.params: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'ABORTED'

item.name: Resumable Space - Error
item.params: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'ERROR'

item.name: Resumable Space - Running
item.params: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'RUNNING'

item.name: Resumable Space - Suspended
item.params: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'SUSPENDED'

item.name: Resumable Space - Timeout
item.params: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'TIMEOUT'

item.name: Scattered Read
item.params: select nvl(sum(round(10 * m.time_waited / nullif(m.wait_count, 0), 3)), 0) from v$eventmetric m, v$event_name n where m.event_id = n.event_id and n.name = 'db file scattered read'

item.name: Scheduler
item.params: select nvl(sum(round(m.time_waited / m.INTSIZE_CSEC, 3)),0) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class = 'Scheduler' and m.wait_class_id = n.wait_class_id

item.name: Sequential Read
item.params: select nvl(sum(round(m.time_waited / m.INTSIZE_CSEC, 3)),0) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class = 'Scheduler' and m.wait_class_id = n.wait_class_id

item.name: Session
item.params: select count(*) from v$session

item.name: SystemIO
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='System I/O' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

item.name: Tablespace
item.params: select count(*) QTDE from (SELECT * FROM (select tablespace_name, round(((sum(usado) * 100) / sum(total)),2) pct_usado from (select t.tablespace_name,sum(decode(t.autoextensible,'YES',t.maxbytes,t.bytes)) total, 0 livre, 0 usado from dba_data_files t group by t.tablespace_name union select s.tablespace_name,0 total, 0 livre, sum(s.bytes) usado from dba_segments s group by s.tablespace_name) group by tablespace_name) where pct_usado > 93)

item.name: Temp Usage
item.params: SELECT nvl(sum(ROUND(((b.blocks * p.VALUE) / 1024 / 1024), 2)), 0) FROM v$session a, v$sort_usage b, v$process c, v$parameter p WHERE p.NAME = 'db_block_size' AND a.saddr = b.session_addr AND a.paddr = c.addr

item.name: Temporary TableSpace
item.params: select count(*) from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SUM((A.USED_BLOCKS * D.BLOCK_SIZE) / 1024 / 1024 * 100) / D.MB_TOTAL)) PERC_USAGE FROM V$SORT_SEGMENT A, v$TABLESPACE b, (SELECT C.TS#, C.BLOCK_SIZE, SUM(GREATEST(T.MAXBYTES,T.BYTES)) / 1024 / 1024 MB_TOTAL FROM v$TEMPFILE C, DBA_TEMP_FILES T WHERE C.FILE#=T.FILE_ID GROUP BY C.TS#,C.BLOCK_SIZE) D WHERE b.Ts# = D.ts# and a.TABLESPACE_NAME = b.NAME GROUP BY D.MB_TOTAL) where PERC_USAGE > 93

item.name: Undo Usage
item.params: SELECT round(sum(blocks) * 8192/1024/1024) value FROM dba_undo_extents WHERE status IN ('UNEXPIRED','ACTIVE')

item.name: Uptime
item.params: select to_char((sysdate-startup_time)*86400, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$instance

item.name: UserIO
item.params: select round(m.time_waited/m.INTSIZE_CSEC,3) from v$waitclassmetric m, v$system_wait_class n where n.wait_class='User I/O' and m.wait_class_id=n.wait_class_id

discovery_rule.name: ASM Disk group DATA2
discovery_rule.params: select NAME "ASM_DISK_GROUP_DATA2", 100 - round(FREE_MB/TOTAL_MB*100, 2) "PCT_USED" from v$asm_diskgroup where NAME='DATA2' order by "PCT_USED" desc;
discovery_rule.description: Discovery que traz o nome do ASM Disk Group DATA2 e o percentual de uso

item_prototype.name: ASM Disk Group {#ASM_DISK_GROUP_DATA2}
item_prototype.params: select 100 - round(FREE_MB/TOTAL_MB*100, 2) "PCT_USED" from v$asm_diskgroup where NAME='{#ASM_DISK_GROUP_DATA2}' order by "PCT_USED" desc;
item_prototype.description: Protótipo de item que retorna o percentual de uso do ASM Disk Group DATA2

trigger_prototype.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {#ASM_DISK_GROUP_DATA2} ASM Disk Group consumption is higher than 85% on {HOST.NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: select NAME "ASM_DISK_GROUP", 100 - round(FREE_MB/TOTAL_MB*100, 2) "PCT_USED" from v$asm_diskgroup where NAME='DATA2' order by "PCT_USED" desc;

discovery_rule.name: ASM Disk group
discovery_rule.params: select NAME "ASM_DISK_GROUP", 100 - round(FREE_MB/TOTAL_MB*100, 2) "PCT_USED" from v$asm_diskgroup where NAME!='DATA2' order by "PCT_USED" desc;
discovery_rule.description: Discovery que traz o nome do ASM Disk Group e o percentual de uso

item_prototype.name: ASM Disk Group {#ASM_DISK_GROUP}
item_prototype.params: select 100 - round(FREE_MB/TOTAL_MB*100, 2) "PCT_USED" from v$asm_diskgroup where NAME='{#ASM_DISK_GROUP}' order by "PCT_USED" desc;
item_prototype.description: Protótipo de item que retorna o percentual de uso de cada ASM Disk Group

trigger_prototype.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {#ASM_DISK_GROUP} ASM Disk Group consumption is higher than 70% on {HOST.NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: select NAME "ASM_DISK_GROUP", 100 - round(FREE_MB/TOTAL_MB*100, 2) "PCT_USED" from v$asm_diskgroup where NAME!='DATA2' order by "PCT_USED" desc;

discovery_rule.name: Tablespace
discovery_rule.params: select tablespace_name, pct_usado from (select tablespace_name, round(((sum(usado) * 100) / sum(total)),2) pct_usado from ( select t.tablespace_name,sum(decode(t.autoextensible,'YES',t.maxbytes,t.bytes)) total, 0 livre, 0 usado from dba_data_files t group by t.tablespace_name union select s.tablespace_name,0 total, 0 livre, sum(s.bytes) usado from dba_segments s group by s.tablespace_name) group by tablespace_name) order by pct_usado desc
discovery_rule.description: Discovery que traz o nome da tablespace e o percentual de uso

item_prototype.name: {#TABLESPACE_NAME}
item_prototype.params: select pct_usado from (select tablespace_name, round(((sum(usado) * 100) / sum(total)),2) pct_usado from ( select t.tablespace_name,sum(decode(t.autoextensible,'YES',t.maxbytes,t.bytes)) total, 0 livre, 0 usado from dba_data_files t group by t.tablespace_name union select s.tablespace_name,0 total, 0 livre, sum(s.bytes) usado from dba_segments s group by s.tablespace_name) group by tablespace_name) where tablespace_name like '%{#TABLESPACE_NAME}%'

trigger_prototype.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace consumption is higher than 93% on {HOST.NAME}

item.name: Access Exclusive Lock
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='AccessExclusiveLock'
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='AccessExclusiveLock'

item.name: Access Share Lock
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='AccessShareLock'
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='AccessShareLock'

item.name: Active connection
item.params: select sum(numbackends) from pg_stat_database

item.name: Buffers Alloc
item.params: select buffers_alloc from pg_stat_bgwriter

item.name: Buffers Backend
item.params: select buffers_backend from pg_stat_bgwriter

item.name: Buffers Checkpoint
item.params: select buffers_checkpoint from pg_stat_bgwriter

item.name: Buffers Clean
item.params: select buffers_clean from pg_stat_bgwriter

item.name: Checkpoints Req
item.params: select checkpoints_req from pg_stat_bgwriter

item.name: Checkpoints Timed
item.params: select checkpoints_timed from pg_stat_bgwriter

item.name: Database Size
item.params: SELECT pg_database_size('zabbix')

item.name: Database Version
item.params: SELECT version()

item.name: Exclusive Lock
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='ExclusiveLock'
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='ExclusiveLock'

item.name: Max Written Clean
item.params: select maxwritten_clean from pg_stat_bgwriter

item.name: Max connections
item.params: SHOW max_connections

item.name: Row Exclusive Lock
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='RowExclusiveLock'
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='RowExclusiveLock'

item.name: Row Share Lock
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='RowShareLock'
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='RowShareLock'

item.name: Share Row Exclusive Lock
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='ShareRowExclusiveLock'
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='ShareRowExclusiveLock'

item.name: Share Update Exclusive Lock
item.params: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='ShareUpdateExclusiveLock'
item.description: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_locks where mode='ShareUpdateExclusiveLock'

item.name: Tuples Deleted
item.params: select sum(tup_deleted) from pg_stat_database

item.name: Tuples Fetched
item.params: select sum(tup_fetched) from pg_stat_database

item.name: Tuples Inserted
item.params: select sum(tup_inserted) from pg_stat_database

item.name: Tuples Returned
item.params: select sum(tup_returned) from pg_stat_database

item.name: Tuples Updated
item.params: select sum(tup_updated) from pg_stat_database

item.name: Xact Commit
item.params: SELECT sum(xact_commit) FROM pg_stat_database

item.name: Xact Rollback
item.params: SELECT sum(xact_rollback) FROM pg_stat_database

item.name: Asynchronous I/O Completion ( ASYNC_IO_COMPLETION )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'ASYNC_IO_COMPLETION'

item.name: Asynchronous Network I/O ( ASYNC_NETWORK_IO )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'ASYNC_NETWORK_IO'

item.name: Backup I/O ( BACKUPIO )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'BACKUPIO'

item.name: Connection Memory
item.params: SELECT cntr_value/1024 as QtdeMB FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE [counter_name] = 'Connection Memory (KB)'

item.name: Threads waiting to process data ( CXPACKET )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'CXPACKET'

item.name: Database Cache Memory
item.params: SELECT cntr_value/1024 as QtdeMB FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE [counter_name] = 'Database Cache Memory (KB)'

item.name: Database Mirroring Send ( DBMIRROR_SEND )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'DBMIRROR_SEND'

item.name: Database Available
item.params: select count(*) INSTANCIA_NOT_ONLINE from sys.databases where state_desc <> 'ONLINE' and name='{$DSN}'
item.description: Coletando se a instância está online ou não. Se o resultado for maior que zero, não está online.

item.name: Database id
item.params: select db_id();
item.description: coletando o id do banco de dados

item.name: Database name
item.params: select db_name();
item.description: coletando o nome do banco de dados

item.name: Dead Locks
item.params: select * from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where object_name like '%Locks%' and counter_name like '%Number of DeadLocks%' and instance_name = '_Total

item.name: Free Temp DB
item.params: select cntr_value / 1024 as Tempdb_FreeSpace_MB from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where object_name like '%Transactions%' and counter_name like '%Free Space in TempDB%'

item.name: I/O Completion ( IO_COMPLETION )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'IO_COMPLETION'

item.name: Latch: Destroy memory ( LATCH_DT )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LATCH_DT'

item.name: Latch: Exclusive write ( LATCH_EX )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LATCH_EX'

item.name: Latch: Keep ( LATCH_KP )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LATCH_KP'

item.name: Latch: Shared read ( LATCH_SH )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LATCH_SH'

item.name: Latch: Non-exclusive write ( LATCH_UP )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LATCH_UP'

item.name: Lazy Writes
item.params: select cntr_value from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where object_name like '%Buffer Manager%' and counter_name like '%Lazy Writes%'

item.name: Lock: Intent Shared Lock ( LCK_M_IS )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_IS'

item.name: Lock: Intent Update Lock ( LCK_M_IU )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_IU'

item.name: Lock: Intent Exclusive Lock ( LCK_M_IX )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_IX'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RIn_NL )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RIn_NL'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RIn_S )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RIn_S'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RIn_U )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RIn_U'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RIn_X )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RIn_X'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RS_S )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RS_S'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RS_U )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RS_U'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RX_S )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RX_S'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RX_U )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RX_U'

item.name: Lock: Index key-range Lock ( LCK_M_RX_X )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_RX_X'

item.name: Lock: Shared Lock ( LCK_M_S )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_S'

item.name: Lock: Schema Modification Lock ( LCK_M_SCH_M )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_SCH_M'

item.name: Lock: Schema Stability Lock ( LCK_M_SCH_S )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_SCH_S'

item.name: Lock: Shared and Intent Update ( LCK_M_SIU )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_SIU'

item.name: Lock: Shared and Intent Exclusive Update ( LCK_M_SIX )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_SIX'

item.name: Lock: Update Lock ( LCK_M_U )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_U'

item.name: Lock: Update and Intent Exclusive ( LCK_M_UIX )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_UIX'

item.name: Lock: Modify data ( LCK_M_X )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'LCK_M_X'

item.name: Locked Sessions > 30 seg
item.params: select COUNT(session_id) from sys.dm_exec_requests where wait_type like 'LCK%' and wait_time > 30000

item.name: Log Write
item.params: select cntr_value from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where object_name like '%Buffer Manager%' and counter_name like '%Checkpoint Pages%'

item.name: Max Worker
item.params: SELECT max_workers_count FROM sys.dm_os_sys_info

item.name: Distributed Queries ( MSQL_DQ )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'MSQL_DQ'

item.name: Extended Stored Procedures ( MSQL_XP )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'MSQL_XP'

item.name: OLEDB
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'OLEDB'

item.name: Page I/O Latch: Page destroy ( PAGEIOLATCH_DT )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGEIOLATCH_DT'

item.name: Page I/O Latch: Page exclusive write ( PAGEIOLATCH_EX )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGEIOLATCH_EX'

item.name: Page I/O Latch: Page keep ( PAGEIOLATCH_KP )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGEIOLATCH_KP'

item.name: Page I/O Latch: Page shared read ( PAGEIOLATCH_SH )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGEIOLATCH_SH'

item.name: Page I/O Latch: Page update ( PAGEIOLATCH_UP )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGEIOLATCH_UP'

item.name: Page Latch: Page destroy ( PAGELATCH_DT )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGELATCH_DT'

item.name: Page Latch: Page exclusive write ( PAGELATCH_EX )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGELATCH_EX'

item.name: Page Latch: Page keep ( PAGELATCH_KP )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGELATCH_KP'

item.name: Page Latch: Page shared read ( PAGELATCH_SH )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGELATCH_SH'

item.name: Page Latch: Page update ( PAGELATCH_UP )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'PAGELATCH_UP'

item.name: Resource Semaphore ( RESOURCE_SEMAPHORE )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'RESOURCE_SEMAPHORE'

item.name: Resource Semaphore Query Compile ( RESOURCE_SEMAPHORE_QUERY_COMPILE )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'RESOURCE_SEMAPHORE_QUERY_COMPILE'

item.name: Stolen Server Memory
item.params: SELECT cntr_value/1024 as QtdeMB FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE [counter_name] = 'Stolen Server Memory (KB)'

item.name: Thread Pool ( THREADPOOL )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'THREADPOOL'

item.name: User Connections
item.params: SELECT cntr_value as QtdeUsuarios FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE [counter_name] = 'User Connections'

item.name: Worker Threads
item.params: select SUM(current_workers_count) as [Current worker thread] FROM sys.dm_os_schedulers

item.name: Write Log ( WRITELOG )
item.params: select wait_time_ms / 1000 from sys.dm_os_wait_stats where wait_type = 'WRITELOG'

item.name: Page I/O Latch (All)
item.params: last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGEIOLATCH_DT]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGEIOLATCH_EX]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGEIOLATCH_KP]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGEIOLATCH_SH]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGEIOLATCH_UP]")

item.name: Page Latch (All)
item.params: last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGELATCH_DT]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGELATCH_EX]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGELATCH_KP]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGELATCH_SH]")+ last("DBforBIX.MSSQL.waitevent[PAGELATCH_UP]")

trigger.name: Active connections is >= Max connections in {HOST.NAME} [CALL-MONIT-INM]
{$DB.TYPE} - Aborted Resumable Statements on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'ABORTED'

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - Datafiles Offline - {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: SELECT count(*) FROM v$datafile WHERE (status != 'ONLINE' AND status != 'SYSTEM')

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - Error Resumable Statements on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'ERROR'

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - Gap archive {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: select a.SEQ_Primary-b.SEQ_Standby GAP from (select dest_id, max(SEQUENCE#) SEQ_Primary from v$archived_log where dest_id=1 group by dest_id) a,(select dest_id, max(SEQUENCE#) SEQ_Standby from v$archived_log where APPLIED ='YES' and dest_id=2 group by dest_id) b

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - Gap archive {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: SELECT round(24*(first_time-(select first_time from v$log_history where sequence# = (select max(seq) from inm_monitor.stdby_logseq))),2) total_min FROM v$log_history WHERE sequence# = (SELECT max(sequence#) FROM v$log_history)

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - Suspended Resumable Statements on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'SUSPENDED'

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - Timeout in Resumable Statements on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: SELECT count(*) from dba_resumable where status = 'TIMEOUT'

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {HOST.NAME} database is unavailable
trigger.description: SELECT CASE status WHEN 'OPEN' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM V$INSTANCE

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {HOST.NAME} is not ONLINE in sys.databases
trigger.description: select count(*) INSTANCIA_NOT_ONLINE from sys.databases where state_desc <> 'ONLINE' and name='{$DSN}'

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {ITEM.VALUE1} Lock Contention on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: select COUNT(session_id) from sys.dm_exec_requests where wait_type like 'LCK%' and wait_time > 30000

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {ITEM.VALUE1} Lock Contention on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: select COUNT(session_id) from sys.dm_exec_requests where wait_type like 'LCK%' and wait_time > 30000

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {ITEM.VALUE1} Lock critical users on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: select count(1) qtd FROM gv$session WHERE (blocking_session IS NOT NULL AND LAST_CALL_ET >= 300 AND EVENT NOT LIKE 'PX Deq%' AND USERNAME IS NOT NULL AND (username LIKE 'WCORRETOR' OR username LIKE 'OPERACAO' OR username LIKE 'USUARIO%' OR username LIKE 'P_RESSEG%'))

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {ITEM.VALUE1} Lock on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: select count(1) qtd FROM gv$session WHERE (blocking_session IS NOT NULL AND LAST_CALL_ET >= 300 AND EVENT NOT LIKE 'PX Deq%' AND USERNAME IS NOT NULL)

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {ITEM.VALUE1} Query long time on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: SELECT count(*) FROM gv$session WHERE type NOT IN ('BACKGROUND','FOREGROUND') AND last_call_et/60 > 720 AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND event NOT LIKE '%Backup%' AND username NOT IN ('SYS','SYSTEM');

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {ITEM.VALUE1} Tablespace consumption on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: select count(*) QTDE from (SELECT * FROM (select tablespace_name, round(((sum(usado) * 100) / sum(total)),2) pct_usado from (select t.tablespace_name,sum(decode(t.autoextensible,'YES',t.maxbytes,t.bytes)) total, 0 livre, 0 usado from dba_data_files t group by t.tablespace_name union select s.tablespace_name,0 total, 0 livre, sum(s.bytes) usado from dba_segments s group by s.tablespace_name) group by tablespace_name) where pct_usado > 93)

trigger.name: {$DB.TYPE} - {ITEM.VALUE1} Temporary tablespace consumption on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: select count(*) from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SUM((A.USED_BLOCKS * D.BLOCK_SIZE) / 1024 / 1024 * 100) / D.MB_TOTAL)) PERC_USAGE FROM V$SORT_SEGMENT A, v$TABLESPACE b, (SELECT C.TS#, C.BLOCK_SIZE, SUM(GREATEST(T.MAXBYTES,T.BYTES)) / 1024 / 1024 MB_TOTAL FROM v$TEMPFILE C, DBA_TEMP_FILES T WHERE C.FILE#=T.FILE_ID GROUP BY C.TS#,C.BLOCK_SIZE) D WHERE b.Ts# = D.ts# and a.TABLESPACE_NAME = b.NAME GROUP BY D.MB_TOTAL) where PERC_USAGE > 93
